titleStmt.title: A short treatise: containing all the principall grounds of Christian religion. By way of questions and answers: very profitable for all sorts of men, but especially for housholders..
titleStmt.author: Ball, John, 1585-1640.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Ball by STC (2nd ed.).

Added t.p.: A short catechisme, with an exposition vpon the same. Containing the principles of religion, very profitable for all sorts of people. The second impression. Printed by C.L. 1617.
